text:
Okay, Mano-chan, put your hands behind you there...
â”€ That's it, that's it, now, try looking into the distance.

Y-Yes...
um, looking into the distance... like this?

Mmhm, good... Can you lift your gaze a bit more?
And while keeping that pose, give me a gentle smile...

Great job, Mano.
The shoot went really smoothly.

The photographers were praising you too.
They said you nailed the expression they wanted right away.

N-No...
It's thanks to the Daurian Redstart, surely...

When I lifted my gaze... I made eye contact...
with a Daurian Redstart flying by...
